languages.text: {n}Энрих треплет Мию по волосам.{/n} "Не обижай Нэми, ей и так сложно. Подумаешь, язык у человека заплетается, и шутки дурацкие, зато сердце на месте!" {n}Он тут же получает подзатыльник от сестры и смеется.{/n}

{n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Don't be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Sure, she's always tongue-tied and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Энрих треплет Мию по волосам.{/n} "Не обижай Нэми, ей и так сложно. Подумаешь, язык у человека заплетается, и шутки дурацкие, зато сердце на месте!" {n}Он тут же получает подзатыльник от сестры и смеется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Do not be mean to Nemi, she is having a hard enough time as it is. Her tongue is slurring and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He immediately gets slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

{n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Do not be mean to Nemi, she is having a hard enough time as it is. Her tongue is slurring and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He immediately gets slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

{n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Do not be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Her tongue is slurring and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

{n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Do not be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Her tongue is slurring and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

{n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Don't be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Sure, she's always tongue-tied and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

{n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Don't be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Sure, she's always tongue-tied and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einrich fährt Mia durch das Haar.{/n} "Sei nicht gemein zu Nemi. Sie hat es schon schwer genug. Sicher, sie hat ein loses Mundwerk und ihre Scherze sind albern, aber sie hat das Herz am rechten Fleck." {n}Er wird von seiner Schwester sofort geschlagen und lacht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Don't be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Sure, she's always tongue-tied and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich fährt Mia durch das Haar.{/n} "Sei nicht gemein zu Nemi. Sie hat es schon schwer genug. Sicher, sie hat ein loses Mundwerk und ihre Scherze sind albern, aber sie hat das Herz am rechten Fleck." {n}Er wird von seiner Schwester sofort geschlagen und lacht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einrich ébouriffe les cheveux de Mia.{/n} « Ne sois pas si dure avec Nemi. C'est déjà assez difficile pour elle, inutile d'en rajouter. Alors, oui, d'accord, elle a la langue bien pendue et elle fait des blagues stupides, mais elle a du cœur, et c'est tout ce qui compte. » {n}Il se prend immédiatement une gifle de sa sœur, mais se contente de rire doucement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Don't be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Sure, she's always tongue-tied and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich ébouriffe les cheveux de Mia.{/n} « Ne sois pas si dure avec Nemi. C'est déjà assez difficile pour elle, inutile d'en rajouter. Alors, oui, d'accord, elle a la langue bien pendue et elle fait des blagues stupides, mais elle a du cœur, et c'est tout ce qui compte. » {n}Il se prend immédiatement une gifle de sa sœur, mais se contente de rire doucement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einrich despeina afectuosamente el cabello de Mia con la mano.{/n} «No seas mala con Nemi, que bastante tiene ya con lo suyo. Es verdad que siempre se le traba la lengua y que sus chistes son terribles, pero su intención es buena». {n}Su hermana le da un manotazo y él se ríe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Don't be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Sure, she's always tongue-tied and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich despeina afectuosamente el cabello de Mia con la mano.{/n} «No seas mala con Nemi, que bastante tiene ya con lo suyo. Es verdad que siempre se le traba la lengua y que sus chistes son terribles, pero su intención es buena». {n}Su hermana le da un manotazo y él se ríe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒがミアの髪をわしゃわしゃとなでる。{/n}「ネミに意地悪をするんじゃない。あの子は今でも十分苦労しているんだ。たしかにいつだって舌っ足らずだし、ジョークもつまらないが、その心は常に正しい場所にあるんだ」{n}彼は即座に妹にぶたれたものの、笑い声をあげる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Don't be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Sure, she's always tongue-tied and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒがミアの髪をわしゃわしゃとなでる。{/n}「ネミに意地悪をするんじゃない。あの子は今でも十分苦労しているんだ。たしかにいつだって舌っ足らずだし、ジョークもつまらないが、その心は常に正しい場所にあるんだ」{n}彼は即座に妹にぶたれたものの、笑い声をあげる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇揉乱了米娅的头发。{/n}“别对涅米这么刻薄，她的日子已经够难过的了。当然了，虽然她说话总是结结巴巴，讲的笑话也很不好笑，但她有颗善良的心。”{n}话音刚落，他就被他妹妹扇了一巴掌，随后哈哈大笑起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Don't be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Sure, she's always tongue-tied and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇揉乱了米娅的头发。{/n}“别对涅米这么刻薄，她的日子已经够难过的了。当然了，虽然她说话总是结结巴巴，讲的笑话也很不好笑，但她有颗善良的心。”{n}话音刚落，他就被他妹妹扇了一巴掌，随后哈哈大笑起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einrich, Mia'nın saçlarını dağıtıyor.{/n} "Nemi'ye huysuzluk yapma. Zaten zor zamanlardan geçiyor. Anlıyorum, ağzı var dili yok. Bir de saçma şakalar yapar ama kötü bir niyeti yok." {n}Einrich, kız kardeşinden anında tokat yiyerek kahkaha atmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich ruffles Mia's hair.{/n} "Don't be mean to Nemi. She is having a hard enough time as it is. Sure, she's always tongue-tied and her jokes are stupid, but her heart's in the right place." {n}He is immediately slapped by his sister and laughs.{/n}
